properties.Name: ProductPackagingItem
properties.Description:
Indicates the number of an item (SKU) that are used in the packaging of the Product.

Note: This contains packaging and supplementary items such as documentation, coupons and free items but does not include any base product items.

Note: Changes  in packaging does not necessarily result in a changed GTIN, UPC, etc. The following are a few of the many examples where a new GTIN, UPC, etc. would be required for the packaged product:
- change of over 20% to a physical dimension, on any axis, or gross weight
- change in the case or pallet orientation (even when there is no change in the base product)
- change in the number of base products included on the pallet
- free trial item included even though this does not change the GTIN, UPC, etc. of the base product

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: ProductPackagingVersionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product Packaging Version.

Columns.Name: ItemSku
Columns.Description: The Stock Keeping Unit identifier, which is typically used for inventory-related activities.

Columns.Name: ProductPackagingItemStartDate
Columns.Description: The effective end date or last date that the item and quantity is used in the product packaging.

Columns.Name: ProductPackagingItemEndDate
Columns.Description: The effective end date or last date that the item and quantity is used in the product packaging.

Columns.Name: PackageComponentTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Package Component Type.

Columns.Name: ProductPackagingItemQuantity
Columns.Description: The number of items contained in a product packaging.

Columns.Name: DepositAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of the deposit associated with the product packaging item. This may also be reflected by PRODUCT SURCHARGE.

Columns.Name: UnitOfMeasureId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Unit Of Measure.

Columns.Name: PackageMaterialTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Package Material Type.

Columns.Name: ProductPackagingItemRecyclableIndicator
Columns.Description: This refers to the packaging item and identifies whether it is recyclable.

Columns.Name: ProductPackagingItemReturnableIndicator
Columns.Description: This refers to the packaging item and identifies whether it is returnable.

Columns.Name: ProductPackagingNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the product packaging.

Properties.Description:
Indicates the number of an item (SKU) that are used in the packaging of the Product.

Note: This contains packaging and supplementary items such as documentation, coupons and free items but does not include any base product items.

Note: Changes  in packaging does not necessarily result in a changed GTIN, UPC, etc. The following are a few of the many examples where a new GTIN, UPC, etc. would be required for the packaged product:

- change in the number of base products included on the pallet
- free trial item included even though this does not change the GTIN, UPC, etc. of the base product
